title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 140.4 - Supervision and employment of teachers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 140.4 - Supervision and employment of teachers

State Regulations

County vocational education and extension boards may employ
only full-time qualified teachers for educational services for day pupils. Provision must also be made for adequate supervision of instruction by
designating a staff member or a superintendent of schools within the county to
serve as a supervisor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
140.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
